plot: This past love affair left some marks of different kinds: if there is no love anymore, proofs of love still exist - letters, especially photos... ; and, as she had fallen in love, it then happened that the tearful young girl fell sick...
title: Mystification ou L'histoire des portraits
plot_es: This past love affair left some marks of different kinds: if there is no love anymore, proofs of love still exist - letters, especially photos... ; and, as she had fallen in love, it then happened that the tearful young girl fell sick...
plot_en: This past love affair left some marks of different kinds: if there is no love anymore, proofs of love still exist - letters, especially photos... ; and, as she had fallen in love, it then happened that the tearful young girl fell sick...
